description: This file defines the BookingController class in a Laravel application, handling API requests related to bookings by delegating to the BookingService and returning responses.

classes.name: BookingController
classes.description: Controller class managing booking-related API endpoints, utilizing BookingService for business logic and ApiResponse trait for standardized responses.

methods.name: store
methods.description: Handles creation of a new booking via the BookingService.

methods.name: updateBooking
methods.description: Updates an existing booking using data from the request.

methods.name: verifyBooking
methods.description: Verifies a booking based on request data.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates booking data identified by ID.

methods.name: getBooking
methods.description: Retrieves a specific booking by ID.

methods.name: generateETicket
methods.description: Generates an electronic ticket for a booking.

methods.name: generateSubBookings
methods.description: Generates sub-bookings for a given booking ID.

methods.name: updateStatus
methods.description: Updates the status of a booking.
